content:
Here are some examples of things that could be described as "absolutely outstanding":

* A performance by an athlete that breaks a world record
* A work of art that is widely regarded as a masterpiece and stands the test of time
* A technological innovation that completely revolutionizes an industry
* An act of heroism that saves lives and inspires others
* A charitable organization that makes a significant positive impact on society
* A book or movie that tells a powerful and unforgettable story that resonates with people on a deep level
* An invention that solves a major environmental or social problem and has a lasting impact
* A scientific discovery that expands our understanding of the world and leads to significant advances
* A humanitarian effort that brings relief and support to those in need on a large scale
* A personal achievement that required tremendous effort, persistence, and dedication, such as earning a degree or completing a marathon.
